title: Ex-Trump Adviser Concealed His Motives, Prosecutors Say
description: The prosecutors grilled Thomas J. Barrack Jr. about emails, including one he passed from an influential Emirati to Jared Kushner, the president’s son-in-law.
dc:creator: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
media:credit: Jefferson Siegel for The New York Times
media:description: Prosecutors say Thomas J. Barrack Jr.’s actions were underhanded, opportunistic and deceptive.
